overview: Filmed at: St. Edmundsbury Cathedral, Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk, England and performed by The Choir Of Clare College, Cambridge.  Tracklisting:  - O Come, O Come Emmanuel  - King Jesus Hath a Garden  - The Holly and the Ivy  - Once in Royal David's City  - Stille Nacht  - Personet Hodie  - In Dulci Jubilo  - While Shepherds Watched Their Flocks by Night  - O Come, All Ye Faithfull  - Coventry Carol  - God Rest You Merry, Gentlemen  - Hark! the Herald Angels Sing
title: Christmas Carols
